@@ -1,5 +1,5 @@
-import React from 'react'
+import React, { useLayoutEffect, useRef } from 'react'
 import v1 from '../assets/video/Scuba Diving - 699.mp4'
 import v2 from '../assets/video/Skate - 49791.mp4'
 import styled from 'styled-components'
 
@@ -40,12 +40,28 @@
 `
 
 
 const CameraSection = () => {
+  const Elem = useRef(null)
+  const videoRef1 = useRef(null);
+  const videoRef2 = useRef(null);
+
+  useLayoutEffect(()=>{
+    gsap.to(Elem, {
+      scrollTrigger: {
+        trigger: Elem,
+        start: 'top top',
+        end: `+=${Elem.offsetWidth + 1000}`,
+        scrub: 1,
+        pin: true,
+        pinSpacing: true
+      }
+    })
+  },[])
   return (
-    <Section>
-      <V1 src={v1} type="video/mp4" autoPlay muted loop />
-      <V2 src={v2} type="video/mp4" autoPlay muted loop />
+    <Section ref={sectionRef}>
+      <V1 ref={videoRef1} src={v1} type="video/mp4" autoPlay muted loop />
+      <V2 ref={videoRef2} src={v2} type="video/mp4" autoPlay muted loop />
     </Section>
   )
 }

   return (
     <Section ref={sectionRef}>
       <V1 ref={videoRef1} src={v1} type="video/mp4" autoPlay muted loop />
       <V2 ref={videoRef2} src={v2} type="video/mp4" autoPlay muted loop />
+      <TitleContainer ref={titleRef}>

     </Section>
   )
